alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 15 at 7:10PM EST until January 16 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Monmouth County and Southeastern Burlington County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Back bays will likely see more impacts than the immediate coast. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Sandy Hook Bay at Sandy Hook MLLW Categories - Minor 6.7 ft, Moderate 7.7 ft, Major 8.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 16/02 AM 7.0 1.8 2.6 Minor 16/02 PM 5.3 0.1 1.5 None 17/03 AM 5.4 0.2 0.7 None 17/03 PM 4.3 -0.9 0.5 None 18/04 AM 5.4 0.2 0.4 None Watson Creek at Manasquan MLLW Categories - Minor 5.7 ft, Moderate 6.7 ft, Major 7.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 16/02 AM 6.2 1.8 2.2 Minor 16/02 PM 4.7 0.3 1.3 None 17/02 AM 4.8 0.4 0.7 None 17/03 PM 3.7 -0.7 0.3 None 18/04 AM 4.7 0.3 0.2 None 18/04 PM 3.5 -0.9 -0.1 None Barnegat Bay at Barnegat Light MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.0 ft, Moderate 2.0 ft, Major 3.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 16/01 AM 4.1 1.6 2.2 Minor 16/02 PM 3.1 0.6 1.6 None 17/03 AM 3.1 0.6 0.9 None 17/04 PM 2.0 -0.5 0.5 None 18/04 AM 2.7 0.2 0.3 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Monmouth; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth
